clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 29.28 bpm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates hyperechoic without fluid collection.
Uterus appears normal; endometrial thickness measures 19.21 mm.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
